comments:
To recreate:
 1. Open the debug perspective
 2. Launch a debug session for an project file
 3. While the Debug View is loading, close the browser.
 4. Attempt to launch another debug session and nothing appears in the Debug View
 
-The following stack trace occurs after step 3:

org.mozilla.xpcom.XPCOMException: The function "jsParent" returned an error condition  (0x80040111)
	at org.mozilla.xpcom.internal.XPCOMJavaProxy.callXPCOMMethod(Native Method)
	at org.mozilla.xpcom.internal.XPCOMJavaProxy.invoke(XPCOMJavaProxy.java:140)
	at $Proxy35.getJsParent(Unknown Source)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.atf.mozilla.ide.core.XPCOMThreadProxy$1.run(XPCOMThreadProxy.java:43)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.UILockListener.doPendingWork(UILockListener.java:155)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.UISynchronizer$1.run(UISynchronizer.java:36)

This prevents any further debug sessions from being launched correctly.
Can't reproduce this in the latest build. A number of changes have occurred in this are, so we may of fixed this by accident.

traces.message: The function "jsParent" returned an error condition  (0x80040111)
